about_the_game:
The music in this soundtrack is specially made by the music producer nightwolf.

The music played in the game is performed in a vertical adaptive dynamic way (splitting a music into multiple tracks and playing different combinations of tracks in different game states), so some of the music heard in the game may be slightly different from the original music in this soundtrack, if you want to get the music in a specific state, I If you want to get a certain state of music, I can export it separately. (But the quality is not as good as Mr. nightwolf's)

Visit Nightwolf:
